tool.name: remove tradis tags
tool.description: Removes transposon sequence and quality tags from the read strings

param.name: mismatches
param.label: Number of mismatches to allow when matching tag

tool.help:
Adds transposon sequence and quality tags to the read strings and outputs a BAM.
Usage: add_tags -b file.bam [options]
Options: -b : bam file with tradis tags -v : verbose debugging output
